homeHeader.title: Register, Get Licensed, and Go Live- All Under One Roof with One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Choosing the wrong business license in Dubai can cost you time, thousands of dollars, and lucrative business opportunities. At One Nexuz, our skilled experts match you with the best-fit business activities and UAE trade license to optimise your legal structure, unlock worldwide banking and flexible visa quotas, and enjoy instant global credibility.

leftSection_1.title: Win Investor Trust, Build Client Confidence, and Scale Worldwide with a Business License
leftSection_1.description: With a business license in hand, you can open bank accounts, sign contracts, sponsor visas, and trade confidently. So, why wait? Get your trade license today to tap into global markets and build trust with customers worldwide.

leftSection_5.title: Get Licensed and Start Scaling with One Nexuz 5-Step License Process

items.title: Book an Initial Consultation
items.description: Our business license services begin with a comprehensive consultation, where we assess your unique business goals.

items.title: Secure Your Trade Name
items.description: Next, we’ll recommend a jurisdiction, license type, and trade name that aligns with your selected business activities.

items.title: Collect Your Documents
items.description: Once the DED approves your trade name, we’ll help you compile, translate, and notarise all the necessary documents.

items.title: Submit Your Application
items.description: With all the documents gathered, we’ll submit your business setup application and handle the government coordination.

items.title: Issue Your Trade License
items.description: Lastly, we’ll pay the licensing fees to secure your trade certificate and Emirates ID within 3-5 business days.

leftSection_6.description: Navigating the UAE’s dynamic regulatory environment can feel overwhelming, with confusing portals, hidden fees, and unexpected delays. Our team simplifies the entire process, providing you with full support from day one to post-launch.

items.title: Accelerate Business Setup

items.title: Avoid Rejections & Delays

items.title: Receive End-to-End Support
items.description: From trade name approvals to visas, our experts manage the entire process while you focus on scaling your business.

leftSection_7.title: Your UAE Business License — Done Right from the Start

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I apply for a license without being in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes! We offer 100% remote setup solutions with digital document handling and paperless options.

items.question: What are the business license requirements in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passport, some basic business info, and approvals from government agencies.

items.question: Is it necessary to own a trade license to establish a business in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you’ll need a trade license to setup and operate in the UAE fully compliant.

items.question: How many types of business licenses are there in the UAE?
items.answer: The Emirates offers diverse range of business licenses, including commercial, professional, industrial, agricultural, and tourist licenses, each tailored to uique business activities.

items.question: How long does a business license remain valid in Dubai?
items.answer: The DED requires all businesses in the city to renew their trade license annually.
